page.title: 03Small shops near Sandhills
page.content: Mrs Reeds is a small shop in Sandhills that sells fresh fruit,groceries,sweets and most things inclueding stamps.Mrs Reed sells Alcohol and cigarettes to people over 18.Before they named it Reeds it was Morris for 16 years.Mrs Reed has 6 people to do her paper rounds.Since Mrs Reed has lived on Sandhills she has always lived in the shop.She will never close the shop down and make one whole house.All day every day Mrs Reed is on her feet Mon-Sat 6.00am-8.00pm Sun 6.00am-1.00pm.Her hardest day is every day.Sandhills had nother shop but it is just a post office.Risinghurst has a shop called Mace and Mr TugbyÂ£s general shop and post office.Forest HillÂ£s shop and post office has closed but Stanton St John still has general shop and post office.
